description: Update a developer trucker certification multiplier.
permissions: Allowed when the user can update the related developer trucker certification via delegated policy to the developer policy (admins, broker members, broker-customer managers, or manager members of the developer).
side_effects: Updates fields on a developer trucker certification multiplier.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument and at least one updatable field. If provided, multiplier must be numeric between 0 and 1 (inclusive). Trailer must belong to the same trucker as the certification, and trailer IDs must be unique per certification.
